allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add OpenAI web agent with dashboard UI

- Implement OpenAI Responses API with file_search \(RAG\) for draft generation
- Add two-tier model strategy: gpt-5-mini for drafts, gpt-5 for high-risk review
- Create web dashboard for managing drafts, runs, and configuration
- Add session-based password authentication \(optional\)
- Implement auto-approve at 85% confidence threshold
- Add guardrail validation for pricing and required elements
- Create vector store setup script for knowledge base

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
